sources.title: The Green Cockatoo 1937 colorized (John Mills)
sources.description: A nightclub entertainer (John Mills) finds himself embroiled in a web of intrigue and danger following the murder of his brother, witnessed by a young woman (René Ray) just arrived in London, who becomes a suspect sought by both the police and a gang of crooks. directed by William Cameron Menzies from a story by Graham Greene John Mills as Jim Connor René Ray as Eileen Robert Newton as Dave Connor Charles Oliver as Terrell Bruce Seton as Madison Frank Atkinson as the Butler If you have a request or a comment for me, please go to the Colorized Movies Forum at https://archive.org/details/colorized-movies?tab=forum I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
